__e: Dad said he'd buy me a guitar and he did.
But when he told me that I couldn't play guitar, and that I'd never be any good at anything...
Look at your father with that guitar,and it was 35 years ago all over again.
I will then not expose father's killer ax for ...
Guys, I think this is my dad's guitar.
I mean, he helped me get my guitar back from Eddie... you know, my game...
I suppose that's possible. But I know for a fact that he took the guitar that I bought with my own money and smashed it in the driveway because I was playing it too loud.
The guitar that I play was his, and it's been passed down
I guess you didn't notice the guitar sitting out there in plain sight.
Then he let me play it, and I kinda lost track of time.
